Package org.graphstream.ui.swingViewer.util

Class Summary
Camera Define how the graph is viewed.
CubicCurve Utility methods to deal with cubic BÃ©zier curves.
FontCache A cache for fonts.
FpsCounter A simple counter that allows to count the number of frames per second.
GradientFactory  
GraphMetrics p Various geometric informations on the graphic graph.
ImageCache A simple cache for images to avoid reloading them constantly and to allow sharing.
MouseManager A global behaviour for all mouse events on graphic elements.
ShortcutManager Utility to centralise the shortcuts and actions for all view instances.
StrokeFactory Generator for strokes based on the given style.
